Once upon a time, there was a barber who liked to cut hair. He had a small shop in the town. Every day, people came to his shop to get new haircuts. The barber was always alert and ready to help them.
One day, a big wind came to the town. It blew and blew, and it was very strong. The barber was scared that the wind would destroy his shop.

started to cry. Bird flew down and said, "I told you to be careful, Dare. But don't worry, I will help you." Bird then surprised Dare by using her wings to gently lift him up and carry him home. From that day on, Dare learned to listen to his friends and be more careful in his adventures.

to listen to his mom when she told him to be careful. Tom ran to Sam and tripped on a rock. His tie fell in a puddle and got very dirty. Tom felt embarrassed because now his tie was not pretty anymore.
Tom's mom tried to clean the tie, but it was too dirty. Tom was sad and cried. He learned that he should have listened to his mom. Now, his favorite tie was ruined and he couldn't wear it anymore. That was a bad day for Tom.

muddy. They wished they had listened to their mom, who had told them to come back before the rain.
When they got home, their mom was waiting for them. She was not happy.
"Anna, Ben, where have you been? I told you to come back before the rain! Look at you, you're a mess!" she said, shaking her head.
"Sorry, mom, we were gathering rocks on the hill and we didn't see the rain coming," Anna said, trying to explain.
"We have some pretty rocks, mom, look!" Ben said, taking out his shiny rock.
